Game: 50 Classic Games 2009-07-14T00:00:00-07:00 Whether you want to play a quick, challenging game or a white-knuckle adventure, hours of fun and entertainment await you. There’s something for everyone in this collection of classic games including Chess, Mahjongg, Sudoku, Backgammon, Texas Hold ‘Em Poker, Solitaire and more. - 50 Classic Games: Endless hours of puzzle, card and board game fun with classics including Mahjongg, Blackjack, Chess, Sudoku, Texas Hold ‘Em Poker, Klondike Solitaire, Free Cell, Chinese Checkers and many more. - Varying Degrees of Difficulty: Challenging AI opponents to match your age or skill level. Step-by-step instructions included for those who need to brush up on the rules! - Hot Seat Support: Compete against family and friends! 1 <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/b668718d-8d12-469a-92c0-785ba24fb65c.png</1> <2>http://images.launchbox-app.com/c5e09541-08ae-4d19-ab4b-82ce4ab0710e.png</2> http://images.launchbox-app.com/126ca461-7103-4894-a4fa-56ec8751bd34.jpg E - Everyone Puzzle Cerasus Media Destineer
